class.name: TrayBroker
class.brief_description: Broker agent for native communication with desktop.
class.description: Desktop components such as native file picker dialogs and notifications need to communicate with the desktop so they can be used inside the engine. This is a singleton tasked with doing communications with the desktop through the native methods (e.g. DBus for LinuxBSD and WinAPI for Windows platforms) and provides a broker end for engine classes (hence the name [TrayBroker]) so these use an unified and reusable interface.
